entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon then west 50 gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
